name: billy's button vol.2
description:
a simple point and click puzzle game where you try to escape the button. when the button breaks curiosity ensues as you see what hungers within. be intrigued as you travel through many rooms with beautiful art and great music figuring out what is in the button. click on items to select them and then click on the object to interact (p:s the arms and the money do not need to be triggered, they are triggered automatically). try to find all 4 endings in this expansive experience of a game.

(P.S press back to get out of the pong game.)
